name: Minescape (itch)
description:
Minescape is a MMORPG inside Minecraft.

It combines Runescape and Minecraft to create a unique RPG. Started in 2012, it features bosses, thousands of items, hundreds of monsters, quests, in-game music and much more!

You can join Minescape using the IP play.gameslabs.net and the resourcepack linked on this page.
